TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartMenuStyle Inherits TableStyle Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
public ref class WebPartMenuStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableStyle, System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor
type WebPartMenuStyle = class inherit TableStyle interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 包含 控件上的菜单的样式属性。

span.span: Contains style characteristics for menus on controls.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类本质上是一个对象, 它包含要应用于控件上的菜单的样式特征。 The class is essentially a object, which contains style characteristics to apply to menus on controls. Web 部件控件集使用对象确定控件上谓词菜单的样式特征。The Web Parts control set uses the object to determine the style characteristics of the verbs menu on a control. 谓词菜单包含在每个控件的标题栏中, 其中包含用户可以执行的各种用户界面 (UI) 操作 (例如, 关闭、最小化、导出或删除控件)。A verbs menu is contained in the title bar of each control, and it includes various user interface (UI) actions (called verbs) that users can perform, such as closing, minimizing, exporting, or deleting a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 通过 使用区域上的属性, 可以在该对象上设置样式属性, 也可以在该区域中的所有控件的谓词菜单上设置样式特性。 You can set style attributes on the object, and thus on the verbs menu of all the controls in a zone, by using the property on a zone. 类具有两个重要属性。The class has two important properties. 第一个是属性, 该属性确定菜单的内容是在控件的左侧对齐、居中或右对齐还是未设置对齐方式。The first is the property, which determines whether the content of the menu is aligned on the left, the center, or the right of the control or the alignment is not set. 如果在用户的系统上启用了菜单阴影功能, 则属性将确定控件上的菜单的阴影颜色。The property determines the color of the shadow for the menu on a control, if the menu shadowing feature is enabled on the user's system. 类还具有一些关键方法。The class also has some critical methods. 方法从传入方法的样式对象复制非空白样式元素, 并将它们应用于对象, 并覆盖进程中的任何现有样式元素。 The method copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed into the method, and applies them to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process. 此方法类似于从传递给方法的样式对象复制非空白样式元素, 但它不会覆盖对象中的现有样式元素。The method similarly copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed to the method, but it does not overwrite existing style elements in the object. 方法从对象的状态袋中移除任何已定义的样式元素。The method removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag. 类还实现了接口中包含的所有方法。 The class also implements all the methods contained in the interface. 通常, 这使类可应用于不同类型的菜单。In general, this enables the class to be applied to different types of menus.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 将非空样式元素复制到 对象，覆盖进程中的所有现有样式元素。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的对象复制样式信息, 如果实例中存在任何现有样式元素, 它将覆盖它们。 The method copies style information from the specified object, and if there are any existing style elements in the instance, it overwrites them. > [!NOTE] > 此方法重写其基方法的一个原因是自定义将值分配给属性的过程。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

Public Overrides Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

member this.HorizontalAlign : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign with get, set

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件上的菜单内容要使用哪种水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets a value indicating what type of horizontal alignment to use for the content of a menu on a control.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该枚举值指定要使用的对齐方式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies what type of alignment to use.

value.span: 默认值可从基 属性值获取。

span.span: The default value is obtained from the base property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性, 以防止设置对齐, 并向属性添加某些特性。The property overrides the base property to prevent the alignment from being set, and to add some attributes to the property. 属性从基属性值获取其值, 但不为 setter 提供任何实现, 因此不能使用此属性来设置菜单内容的对齐方式。The property gets its value from the base property value, but does not provide any implementation for the setter, so you cannot set the alignment of the menu content by using this property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: A that contains style information to copy.

summary.span: 将非空样式元素复制到 实例，但不覆盖现有样式元素。

span.span: Copies nonblank style elements to the instance, but does not overwrite existing style elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法类似于方法, 因为它从指定的对象复制样式元素, 但它的不同之处在于, 它不会覆盖实例中的任何现有样式元素。 The method is similar to the method in that it copies style elements from a specified object, but it differs in that it does not overwrite any existing style elements in the instance. > [!NOTE] > 此方法重写其基方法的一个原因是自定义将值分配给属性的过程。One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 从 对象的状态袋中移除所有已定义的样式元素。

span.span: Removes any defined style elements from the object's state bag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法与类中的基方法非常相似。 The method is very similar to the base method in the class. 在对属性进行一些自定义处理后, 此方法只需调用基方法即可从状态袋中移除所有剩余的样式元素。After some custom handling for the property, this method simply calls the base method to remove any remaining style elements from the state bag.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ShadowColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定 控件上菜单的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the shadow color for a menu on a control.
A that determines the shadow color.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当用户在其系统上启用了 Microsoft Windows 菜单阴影功能时, 属性才会生效。The property takes effect only when users have the Microsoft Windows menu-shadowing feature enabled on their systems. 当启用菜单阴影时, 属性将设置在菜单内容周围创建的阴影的颜色。When menu shadowing is enabled, the property sets the color of the shadow that is created around the menu content. 如果没有为属性分配任何颜色值, 则菜单上不会显示阴影, 即使系统上启用了菜单阴影。If no color value is assigned to the property, no shadow will appear on menus, even if menu shadowing is enabled on the system.
